author: Jacques Straub
description: Made with an Old Tom gin with amplified botanicals and minimal sugar (some are way too sweet) this is a spiritous and, if you hit the right dilution, tasty and complex cocktail.
name: Alaska (Straub's 1914 recipe)
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all the ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
